name: filter_fats
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool keto_diet.
Tool description: Dataset of over 450 Ketogenic diet recipes in over 10 categories from Breakfast to Dinner.  Check out encurate.app to manage content on your mobile apps. Contact to feature your app on encurate.app website.
API description: Gives keto recipes within given range of fat content.
fat_in_grams__lt = Less than
fat_in_grams__gt = Greater than

fat_in_grams_lt.description: The upper limit for the fat content in grams.

fat_in_grams_gt.description: The lower limit for the fat content in grams.
